docs.snippet: Gambian authorities have released 98 prisoners, mostly from the notorious Mile 2 prison, an Interior Ministry spokesman said on Friday, as the country seeks to turn a page on the authoritarian era of ousted former president Yahya Jammeh....

headline.main: Gambia Frees Nearly 100 Prisoners From Jammeh Era
